meanings.definition: A plant of the daisy family with yellow or orange flowers.
meanings.sent1: The tickseed in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I picked a bouquet of tickseed flowers for my mom.
meanings.sent3: The tickseed in the field waved hello to the passing butterflies.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a field of tickseed flowers.
meanings.sent5: The tickseed plant added a splash of color to the landscape.

meanings.definition: The seed of a tickseed plant.
meanings.sent1: I planted tickseed in the soil to grow more plants.
meanings.sent2: The tickseed seeds were tiny but full of potential.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel mistook the tickseed for a tasty snack.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas spread like tickseed seeds in the wind.
meanings.sent5: Each tickseed seed held the promise of new life.
